scripts.theme: git submodule init && git submodule update
scripts.deploy: hugo && aws s3 sync public/ s3://aws-alexa-workshop/ --delete --profile lab798 && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id EPQGD99IJMFGD --paths "/*" --profile lab798
scripts.deploycontent: aws s3 sync public/ s3://us-east-1-eksworkshop.com/ --delete --cache-control "max-age=3600, public" --exclude "*" --include "*.html" --include "*.xml"
scripts.deploytemplates: aws s3 sync templates/ s3://${TEMPLATE_BUCKET}/templates/${CODEBUILD_GIT_CLEAN_BRANCH}/ --delete --acl public-read --cache-control "max-age=86400, public"
scripts.deployothers: aws s3 sync public/ s3://us-east-1-eksworkshop.com/ --delete --cache-control "max-age=86400, public" --exclude "*.html" --exclude "*.xml"
